modName: Mild-Mannered ORC Follower with BERSERKER BODYGUARD Mode
summary: ALORKA is seeking Spiritual Enlightenment (aspires to be a MONK), yet he is an Over-Powered COMPANION that just cannot seem to control his BERSERKER RAGE towards anybody who attacks his BFF: YOU... however, his Spiritual Aspirations compel him to only fight UN-ARMED, as he is loyal to his Spiritual Mentor Philosophy: Burce Leerak...
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/66374-0-1432803362.png[/img]


[color=#f1c232][size=3]Hey SKYRIM Fam[/size][/color] [i][size=3][img]http://www.freesmileys.org/smileys/smiley-hug006.gif[/img][/size][/i]
 
Allow us to introduce y'all to ALORKA...
 
ALORKA is seeking Spiritual Enlightenment (aspires to be a MONK), yet he's an Over-Powered COMPANION that just cannot seem to control his BERSERKER RAGE towards anybody who attacks his BFF: YOU
 
however, his Spiritual Aspirations compel him to only fight UN-ARMED, as he's loyal to his #1 Spiritual Mentor's Philosophy: Burce Leerak (ancient Half-ORC ancestor of Bruce Lee, who's Philosophy is "Only Use Your PHYSICAL INSTRUMENT to Protect Yourself & Never Do More Damage Than Absolutely Necessary")
 
BUT, ALORKA's Punches/Kicks are more powerful than ANY weapon in SKYRIM
 
 
------------------
[color=#e69138][size=4]GAMEPLAY[/size][/color]
------------------
 
ALORKA has just undergone an intense Spiritual Sabbatical at the Solitude TEMPLE Of The SHRINES... he awaits there for you to come, as y'all
have arranged to live together at your home.
 
From thence on, he's your Loyal Companion...  anybody who's enemy enough to attack you must BEWARE his BERSERKUNG-FU,
as they just won't stand-a-chance.
 
 
-----------------------------------------------------
[color=#e69138][size=4]Required & Recommended MODS[/size][/color]
-----------------------------------------------------
 
This MOD is for HARDCORE SKYRIM'ers who want a BRUTALLY IMMERSIVE experience of an UN-ARMED BodyGuard companion-follower; thus, in order to take full advantage of ALORCA's custom-AI, as well as his devastating Martial Arts UN-ARMED combat anim's, you should have the following MODS
installed in this order (we've gone thru exhaustive testing to combine the very best "work-well-together" MODS that create the ALORCA experience
intended):
 
 
1 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6701/?]DualFury[/url] [HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]
 
2 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23107/?]RDED[/url] [HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]
 
3 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12615/?]LocationalDamage[/url] [HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]
 
4 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5485/?]DeadlyCombat [/url][HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]
 
5 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9421/?]MartialArts [/url][color=#ff0000][size=3]REQUIRED [/size][/color](with the Options of FRONT-FLIP & FLY-KICK/DEATH Animations HIGHLY RECOMMENDED)
 
6 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50416/?]UnarmedWarfare [/url][HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]
 
7 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16127/?]ArcaneFists [/url][HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]
 
8 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56980/?]VioLens [/url][HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]
 
9 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64127/?]UnArmed STAGGER[/url] [HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]
 
10 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57622/?]UnArmed BLOOD & SOUND Enhancer[/url] [HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]
 
11 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16533/?]FISTS of FURY Gauntlets[/url] [color=#ff0000][size=3]REQUIRED [/size][/color](to be acquired in-game thru ALORKA's mini-quest)
 
12 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]AFT [/url](set-up as per ALORKA's custom-instructions [color=#ff0000][size=3]REQUIRED [/size][/color]- can use UFO or other similar Follower MODs,  but must set-up as per instructions as well)
 
13 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65471/?]AFT Immersive Dialogue[/url] [HIGHLY RECOMMENDED]
 

-------------------------------
[color=#e69138][size=4]WIP - Test Release[/size][/color]
-------------------------------
 
NB: again, although we've thoroughly tested ALORKA & he's ready to be officially released, we always believe in public-testing prior; so as this is a
"WIP Test-Release", be sure NOT TO SAVE on any important GameSaves
 
We greatly look forward to yall's Comments/Feedback/Questions - once we feel comfortable that ALORKA is playing well for the 1st dozen-or-so peeps who DL him, we'll post the official release announcement.
 
 
THANKS YA'LL - NOW GO CONQUER SKYRIM & FEAR NO ENEMY - HAVE FUN
 
 
[color=#f1c232][size=3][i]Peace, Love, & SUCCESS
 [img]http://www.freesmileys.org/smileys/smiley-hug006.gif[/img][/i]
[i]Alex & Taina[/i][/size][/color]
